info.author: Geoffrey T. Dairiki
info.description:
Pyxine is a Python package which provides bindings
to libxine, the back-end of the xine move player.  Using pyxine it is
possible to write simple (or complex) movie players in the Python language.
info.name: pyxine
info.summary: Python bindings for the xine media player
info.html_description: Pyxine is a Python package which provides bindings to libxine, the back-end of the xine move player. Using pyxine it is possible to write simple (or complex) movie players in the Python language.
